properties.displayName: Azure Active Directory Hybrid Health AD FS Suspicious Application
properties.description:
This detection uses AzureActivity logs (Administrative category) to identify a suspicious application adding a server instance to an Azure AD Hybrid Health AD FS service or deleting the AD FS service instance.
Usually the Azure AD Connect Health Agent application with ID cf6d7e68-f018-4e0a-a7b3-126e053fb88d and ID cb1056e2-e479-49de-ae31-7812af012ed8 is used to perform those operations.
